formatDescription: Zoomify offers the ability to pinto high resolution images. It works by converting a high resolution image into a collection of JPEG tiles that are stored within a .zif file. This file can in turn be displayed within a web browser with the aid of a javascript library.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: 11/2023 (v.116)- internal signature expanded. Submitted by Preservica; 07/2024 (v.119)- priority over fmt/1917 BigTIFF added. Submitted by Preservica.
